jobs_internships.name: Ernst & Young, Singapore
jobs_internships.description: Consulting, Technology Risk Intern. Collaborated with team to identify and evaluate technology-related risks undertaking assessments of clients' IT systems and processes and recommend ways to mitigate identified risks. Supported in refining risk management strategies, creating reports for clients, and staying up to date with industry regulations and best practices.

jobs_internships.name: Singapore Arm Forces
jobs_internships.description: 1st Battalion Commando | Lieutenant. Planned and led team of 30 men to train and participate in major exercises locally and in overseas.

jobs_internships.name: AIESEC IN NTU
jobs_internships.description: Incoming Global Exchange Team. Sourced internships for students from other countries, providing cross-cultural learning opportunities. Developed cross-cultural communication skills by collaborating with team members from various countries and working with international partners.

projects.name: Autonomous Robotic System
projects.description: Collaborated with 4 cross-disciplinary teams to design and build a robotic system capable of autonomous exploration, image detection, and control signal communication using an Android-powered device. Designed and implemented a user-friendly graphical user interface (GUI) in Java, facilitating real-time interaction between the robotic system and the control device over a period of 12 weeks. Established reliable wireless communication between the robotic system and Android devices using Bluetooth, enhancing the system's responsiveness and control.
